answers.answer: In pretty sure you can't diet but maybe stock up on healthy snacks like fruit that's easy to grab and go. Then walking an hour a day 3-4 days a week. So like walk the mall or grocery store or what not :)

There are a lot of great blogs I found on pinterest for nutrition after baby. I'm in the same position as you. I'm only 25 weeks and I've already gained 50 lbs. Even though I'm eating healthy I keep packing on the lbs. Just try to keep active after you have baby and eat clean.

title: Gain 76 pounds n have 8 weeks to go
